prompt: Re-write this music caption in three different styles. You can mix the order of the instruments.
inputs: This song includes Bass, Piano, Guitar, Drums, but without Strings.
captions:
Style 1:
This piece of music features Bass, Piano, Guitar, and Drums, but no Strings.

Style 2:
This song is composed of Bass, Piano, Guitar, and Drums, omitting Strings.

Style 3:
This composition is comprised of Bass, Piano, Guitar, and Drums, excluding Strings.
